2023.projectDescription: AgroAssist is a webpage that intends to reduce the environmental impact of agricultural and irrigation techniques, by optimizing the use of resources and adapting practices to mitigate climate change.
An answering machine service with artificial intelligence for support on medical emergencies.
A project aimed at helping people with COPD to monitor possible relapses in the post-treatment stage, a solution that includes the use of hardware, software and cloud computing.

2022.projectDescription: A device that with IoT and scalability with ML, helps to have a visualization of water consumption inside the home. This device is easy to implement as it works with a simple water plug.
Optimizes the irrigation process of a crop, minimizing water loss and maximizing production in reduced spaces.
Enables transactions between bank accounts by just using the face of whoever you want to send money to, as the account ID.

2021.projectDescription: Street eye notifes users when reckless driving is detected near their current location. Hopefully making users more aware and more careful when this sort of situation arises.
A tool for every person with visual disabilities that can be compensated by the use of AI.
A sign language translator that uses a webcam, and translates some signs to be more accessible to everyone.

2020.projectDescription: A platform for professors to create quizzes displayed at television for their students to participate with a telephone number.
A web app to create a layout of a user's place for certain number of people, returning the same layout with each human space following restrictions of distance and client capacity.

Utilizing computer vision, temperature sensors, and motors, the product tracks the forehead of a person that wants to get in a room, keeping a log of the temperature of all the visitors with a web application.

2019.projectDescription: Leveraging Computer Vision and Machine Learning for General Purpose Population Density Analysis.
A device that allows a person to remotely interact with the world. Be it a doctor or astronaut, being there will no longer be a limitation to what they can do.
"Find the clothes you like with the help of AI". Clothify is a mobile app where users upload a photo of their favorite clothes for receiving suggestions of similar items in order to purchase them.
